content: Hi sir, I am Jayshantaran. I am from E-Road. I am studying currently VTech degree in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

Nice to meet you, Jeyachandran. It's great to have you here today. I see that you have a strong academic background, currently pursuing your B.Tech in A.I. and Machine Learning from Kongu Engineering College. Your skills and experience in full-stack development, AI, and Machine Learning are impressive. Can you walk me through your experience as an AI Project Developer at Shine Logics? What was the scope of your project and what were some of the key technologies you used?
